testcase.name: Check that user can navigate to 'Computers & Tablets' page and select 'HP' from 'Featured Brands' selection.
testcase.system-out: Given I am on Amazon homepage...............................................passed When I click on Shop By Category burger button..............................passed And I click on Computers....................................................passed And I click on Computers & Tablets..........................................passed And I click on HP checkbox from Featured Brands selection...................passed Then I verify that HP checkbox is selected..................................passed
